ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:20:43 [Issue ID 4000-130290] urn:comicvine:4000-130290 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 23:53:19. [Issue ID 165313]
ComicInfo.Summary:
A look at the Tonight Show with Jay Leno.
A cynical look at justice, cars, strategy, dentists, achievement, therapy, big business, relationships, efficiency, rationalization, the office, nursery rhymes, and doctors.

ComicInfo.Title: The U.S. Constitution of Catholic Bishops’ Official Edict on Pedophile Priests; MAD Deconstructs TV Talk Shows; Monroe and… the Big House; Mad’s Modern Animal Crackers; Star Bores: Epic Load II — Attack of the Clowns; Drastic Cutbacks in the Music Industry; 8 Top Secret Facts About Austin Powers in Goldmember that Mike Myers Doesn’t Want You to Know; Mad’s Thumbs Up/Thumbs Down Review Why You Should or Shouldn’t See Austin Powers in Goldmember; How to Spice Up Your Video Will; Confidential Documents You Won’t Find on thesmokinggun.com; Conclusive Evidence of the Ever-Widening Gap Between Baseball’s Small & Large Market Teams; A Mad Look at Star Wars: Attack of the Clones; The Lighter Side of...; Eminem: The Senior Citizen Years
